title: On the soil with flowers
content:
On the soil with flowers and trees
Ancient redwoods take me centuries back
Lost and found I do not know my name
I am me and you are just the same
I watch branches trailing in the sky
Memories gone destined now to die
It didn't matter now in eternity
Fragrant branches formed my crown
Red black clouds drifting all around
Rhythm and sounds became my language then
I was alone yet I was in my den
Animal now a higher ape
I sang laughed knew I had a family
Somewhere in silence there was another me.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kpV2eTCxjjY&feature=youtu.be
